name: Science|Business
goal:
Science|Business is a media and communications company focused on research and innovation in Europe. Its activities include:

1. The Science|Business Network contributes to the debate for Europeâ€™s research and innovation policy through original thought leadership, research and executive meetings. It links leading European technology universities (incl. NTNU, ETH Zurich, Karolinska, Bologna, Aalto), multinationals (incl. Microsoft, GE, Sanofi, Toyota) and government agencies (Innovate UK, COST, Tekes) - bringing together industry, research and policy.

For more information:
http://www.sciencebusiness.net/Membership/MembershipOverview.aspx

2. Science|Business news is a free online news service focused on EU research and innovation with 18,000 registrants across the EU and internationally.

For more information:
http://www.sciencebusiness.net

3. Science|Business consulting provides communication services to network members and other clients. These services include sponsored events, special reports, and communication strategies within the European innovation community.

For more information:
http://www.sciencebusiness.net/General/SB_Consulting.aspx
